mapper.update:
UPDATE cb_active_order
id = #{id},
client_id = #{clientId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
status = #{status},
order_ori_money = #{orderOriMoney},
order_money = #{orderMoney},
order_ori_modify_money = #{orderOriModifyMoney},
order_modify_money = #{orderModifyMoney},
pay_time = #{payTime},
member_code = #{memberCode},
member_name = #{memberName},
phone = #{phone},
detail = #{detail},
AND id = #{id}
AND client_id = #{clientId}
AND order_id = #{orderId}

UPDATE cb_active_order
client_id = #{clientId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
status = #{status},
order_ori_money = #{orderOriMoney},
order_money = #{orderMoney},
order_ori_modify_money = #{orderOriModifyMoney},
order_modify_money = #{orderModifyMoney},
pay_time = #{payTime},
member_code = #{memberCode},
member_name = #{memberName},
phone = #{phone},
detail = #{detail},
WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

UPDATE cb_active_order
client_id = #{clientId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
order_id = #{orderId},
status = #{status},
order_ori_money = #{orderOriMoney},
order_money = #{orderMoney},
order_ori_modify_money = #{orderOriModifyMoney},
order_modify_money = #{orderModifyMoney},
pay_time = #{payTime},
member_code = #{memberCode},
member_name = #{memberName},
phone = #{phone},
detail = #{detail},
WHERE order_id = #{orderId} and status != 0

UPDATE cb_active_order
return_bill_no = #{returnBillNo},
return_money = #{returnMoney},
WHERE order_id = #{orderId} and client_id = #{clientId}
